thread.title: BRIEF-Cardinal Health Reports Q3 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.39

title: BRIEF-Cardinal Health Reports Q3 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.39
text:
May 3, 2018 / 10:59 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Cardinal Health Reports Q3 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.39 Reuters Staff
May 3 (Reuters) - Cardinal Health Inc:
* CARDINAL HEALTH REPORTS THIRD-QUARTER RESULTS FOR FISCAL YEAR 2018
* Q3 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.39 * Q3 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.81
* Q3 REVENUE $33.6 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $33.45 BILLION
* Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.51 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $4.85 TO $4.95 * UPDATES FISCAL YEAR 2018 OUTLOOK.
* THIRD-QUARTER REVENUE FOR PHARMACEUTICAL SEGMENT INCREASED 5 PERCENT TO $29.7 BILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
